column3: Latest;Phnom Penh------:  ------ A man was arrested at 8:05 pm on November 1
column9: a Filipino musician was caught with 3 bags of methamphetamine
column13: and $ 543 dollars in cash.------Before the incident
column14: the Sen Sok district commander had set up a control point to check for drugs and weapons in vehicles. The suspect was given a stop check by police and the drugs were discovered.------Police then detained the suspect for questioning at the Police Inspectorate in Sen Sok district.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/269383------
